subject: Soccer
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: A week after Women’s Professional Soccer shut down the Los Angeles Sol, the league’s best player, Marta, was selected third by F.C. Gold Pride in a dispersal draft.
snippet: A week after Women’s Professional Soccer shut down the Los Angeles Sol, the league’s best player, Marta, was selected third by F.C. Gold Pride in a dispersal draft.
